title: ATLAS - Check forced SGPBS pools/statuses presence in Atlas EV3

task_list.instruction_title:
Extract updated QI pool and Fatca statuses for the migrated clients for TAX Team.
/SECLI results (SGPBS pools/status, indicia) feed ATLAS - SGPBS pools and statuses in SECLI are fed into ATLAS/
TAX Team verify that Atlas extraction results return the migrated SGPBS QI pools, Fatca statuses.
